constituent: stature, north, spoon, sitting on the ground, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisigStory: One's stature is measured according to the "northern-most" part of the body.
koohiiStory1: While japanese people are generally small, people in the northern contryes have taller stature because of all the flesh they eat!
koohiiStory2: Up in the Great White North, we eat a lot of meat - thus giving us great STATURE. Mmmm.... baby seals.
kunYomi: せ、せい、そむ.く、そむ.ける
myStory: cao tự nhiên. phẩm giá. nhờ sự lỗ lực thành công. trăng phía bắc luôn có giá cao. cái đầu. bộ phận phía bắc.
readingExamples: 背 (せ), 背 (せい), 背く (そむ.く), 背ける (そむ.ける)
words: to be burdened with, to carry on back or shoulder
to run counter to, to go against, to disobey, to infringe
be burdened with, carry on back or shoulder
